snippet.title: Gestalt: Steam & Cinder | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Inspired by 16 and 32-bit classics, Gestalt: Steam & Cinder fuses tight 2D platforming and exhilarating combat with an engrossing, twist-laden narrative in a stunningly handcrafted steampunk world.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1231990/Gestalt_Steam__Cinder/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GestaltGame
Discord: https://t.co/KMV0FjLhTp
